definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: A decade ago I might have attended one of Whitney’s seminars (if I could have afforded it).
sentences.chinese: 十年前我就应该参加Whitney的研讨班的。

sentences.english: The morning session of the seminar was not well attended.
sentences.chinese: 这个研讨会的晨会出席状况不甚理想。

sentences.english: The thermal therapy terminated after the terminal germ seminar.
sentences.chinese: 热疗在期末细菌研讨会吿终止了。

sentences.english: At the same time, they can receive information and knowledge about the development.
sentences.chinese: 并与此同时，获得我们对前海研讨的知识。

sentences.english: He has also held seminars at Samra University of Oriental, Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他后来也在东方萨姆拉中医药大学举行研讨会。

sentences.english: Mr. Scott got sick and I have to attend the Speechmaker’s Symposium in his place.
sentences.chinese: Scott先生生病了，我要替他去参加研讨会。

sentences.english: This thesis main discuss consumption psychology and behavior in network environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文便非闭于网络环境上的长耗神理取行为入行研讨。

sentences.english: The seminar is a collaboration between the computer science and mathematics department.
sentences.chinese: 这个研讨会是计算机系和数学系合作举办的。

sentences.english: I acted as one of the speakers in the Sino-Swedish Arbitration Seminar in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 作为发言人之一，参加2006年中瑞仲裁研讨会。

sentences.english: This discovery opens up new vistas of research for biologists.
sentences.chinese: 这一发明为生物学家展现了新的研讨远景。

sentences.english: On the same day, the International Media Seminar on Peace in the Middle East opened in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 同日，中东和平问题国际媒体研讨会在北京开幕。

sentences.english: The policy forum is the highlight of the event.
sentences.chinese: 而政策研讨则会是整项活动的高潮。

sentences.english: I have no memory of the Friday seminar meetings.
sentences.chinese: 我不记得星期五研讨会的情况了。

sentences.english: Can you suggest a place where we can have our next seminar?
sentences.chinese: 你能提出一个可供我们下一次研讨会开会的场所吗？

sentences.english: BL often participates in the seminars and discussions in innovative industry with Sino-European countries.
sentences.chinese: 长期参与中欧等国家创意行业论坛与交流研讨。

sentences.english: In this sense, this seminar could not have been timelier.
sentences.chinese: 从这个意义上讲，这次研讨会恰逢其时。

definition: research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to observe and emulate/to study (esp. following sb's example)
